title: Agbada
description: Man\'s tunic; brown, golden yellow embroidery; brown fabric with gold stripe; holes woven into fabric in horizontal stripes; rows of holes connected vertically with brown thread on surface; wide collar of gold embroidery; geometric motifs include knots, ovals and stripes; see pants L2010.200.165.2
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
